resources.string: El nombre de usuario no es válido
La contraseña debe tener al menos 3 caracteres

Just ask God

 Just ask God
 That pain can not be indifferent to me
 That death does not find me dry
 Cow and one without having done enough.

 Just ask God
 Let me no wrong to be indifferent
 I did not slap the other cheek
 A claw Despus arae me luck.

 Just ask God
 That war did not indifferent
 It's a big monster stomps
 All the poor innocence of people.

 Just ask God
 That deception is indifferent I
 If a traitor can more than a few
 That those few do not forget easily.

 Just ask God
 The future will not be indifferent to me
 Wretched is he who has to leave
 To live a different culture.

 Just ask God
 That war did not indifferent
 It's a big monster stomps
 All the poor innocence of people.
